attributes.action: Publish in FULL all unredacted Covid-19 vaccine contracts/liability waivers
attributes.additional_details: In a democracy, the public - who paid for these vaccines - should be able to scrutinise and review all contracts and liability waivers pledged by any Government department or minister with any external supplier. These should be fully unredacted and easily accessible.
attributes.background: Publish for public scrutiny the full, unredacted contracts and liability waivers signed between the UK Government and the Covid-19 vaccine suppliers

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a freedom of information request here:
https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
